data.text: @jakubstefun Hi Jakub, please send us your booking code and your request in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris
@jakubstefun Hi, how can we assist you? Kind regards, James
@kavakosta Hi, we have just replied to your other message. Kind regards, James
@MohamadNobakht2 Hi, please tell us your booking code and we'll try to help. Kind regards, James
@cryptohackz Hi David, yes it is. Make sure you choose "After" for when did your concern arise to make sure that your inquiry will be directed to the respective department. Kind regards, Sarah

@hollywoodtwit Hi, sorry for the inconvenience caused. Please direct message us your e-mail address or your booking code and we'll check the status of your request. Kind regards, James https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s
@speranzascapp Hi, we're sorry for the inconvenience caused. Please refer to the contact on your report. Our respective colleagues will provide you with more detailed information. Kind regards, James
@julkravc Hi, please contact in this case directly specialcases@austrian.com. Kind regards, Christine
@ErikWirkensjo Hi Erik,  Austrian Airlines flights to and from Chisinau (Moldova) will be suspended until April 25th, 2022.  Best regards, Christiane
@andycroa Hi Andy, no, it's not an issue. Best regards, Christiane

@maskachaskaa  Hi Abhishek, please try between 8 and 9am when it is usually less busy. You can find all our international numbers or use our online rebooking form here: https://t.co/XuBJatBmUJ Kind regards, Lyndsay

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @speranzascapp Great news👍✈️ Kind regards, Derya

@speranzascapp Hi Speranza, we regret to hear that your baggage was not dully delivered and apologize for any inconvenience this has caused. Did you already make a lost report at arrival? Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

@gergott Hi Gerald, es tut mir leid, dass du so lange warten musstest. Wir haben aktuell wieder sehr viele Anrufe. Bitte entschuldige die Unannehmlichkeiten. Bitte sende uns deine Anfrage in einer DM. Wir sehen uns das gerne für dich an. Liebe Grüße, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

@officaldanielal Hi Daniel,  Due to the current situation all our channels are very busy, unfortunately. If your request has not been solved already please send us your booking code and your new required flight details in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris
@hollylynnny Hi Holly, please send us your booking code and your new required flight details in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris

@patrickfrompgh Hi Patrick, Masks in the form of a FFP2 are compulsory during your journey with Austrian until further notice. Higher classified masks can be worn as long as they do not have a valve. Children under 6 are still exempt from this requirement. Kind regards, Chris

@alexborraska Hi Coma, thank you for reaching out. I´m sorry that your refund request is still pending. Please send us your mail id or your booking code in a DM. We´ll gladly have a closer look at this matter. Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

@iszilagyi Hi Istvan, bitte beachte, dass die Einteilung der jeweiligen Parkpositionen nach Verfügbarkeit und operativen Gesichtspunkten vom jeweiligen Flughafen und nicht seitens der Airline durchgeführt wird. Freundliche Grüße, Chris
@burdarov Hi there, thank you for your kind feedback which we will gladly forward to our colleagues. Kind regards, Chris
@nabil_nygiants Hi there, please find all our worldwide contacts via the following link: https://t.co/Af7NsKSvP9 Kind regards, Chris

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @syllabe16 Hi there, we recommend you to be at the check-in/baggage drop-off counter approx. 1,5 to 2 hours before departure. Kind regards, Derya

„Honey, I’m home!”

Our long haul fleet is finally complete again ❤️✈️

32 days and almost 15 flight hours later, the “Spirit of Austria” returned to #Vienna after its maintenance check in #Taipei!

#ServusB777 #LovingTheWorld https://t.co/kMZBL7vZSz
@BasicallyfamRox Hi Roxy, please use this link instead https://t.co/1I6o96BkO3. Kind regards, Christine

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @ARSegars Hi Andrew, thank you for reaching out. Here https://t.co/KaMyQ4ZQLK you can find our upgrade options. Hope you will find a suitable one for you. Kind regards, Derya

urls.title: Upgrades
urls.description: Find out here about all the options for booking an upgrade. Well in advance or at short notice - you decide.

data.text: @Pa1Lin Hi, please try this link https://t.co/LFFiZWBwMH. If you are still facing difficulties please try to use a different browser or empty your cache. Kind regards, Derya
@pa1lin Hi there, we already replied to your message via Instagram. Kind regards, Chris

entity.name: ¡Es el cumpleaños de Miguel Herrera! 🎂
entity.description: Los Tweets a continuación son parte de una conversación en tiempo real detectada por un algoritmo.

data.text: Happy Birthday to our flying Schnitzel! 🎉✈ Exactly one year ago, we started offering #sustainable and #regional Austrian delights on all short and medium-haul flights in Economy Class! 🌱🍽 For more info click here ➡ https://t.co/Nv5S1DqL8l https://t.co/lHnVI3uLfl

urls.title: Austrian Melangerie
urls.description: Welcome to Austrian Melangerie: Enjoy selected Austrian dishes and regional snacks on our short- and medium-haul flights.

data.text:
@amberf1_ Hi Amber, we are sorry that you missed your connecting flight.The minimum connecting time at Vienna airport is 25 minutes, You can find this information also on Vienna's airport website https://t.co/h4CPGJNjt6
Kind regards, Sarah

urls.unwound_url: https://www.viennaairport.com/en/passengers/arrival__departure/transfer#:~:text=Transfer VIA VIENNA is quicker,of the fastest in Europe.

data.text: @KellyKe47840925 Hi Kelly, we already replied to your message via Facebook. Kind regards, Christine
@rmwermwc Hi Rebecca, please provide us with your e-mail address in a DM and we'll try to find your claim in our system. Kind regards, James https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

@BasicallyfamRox Hi Roxy, We apologize for the impression you had. However, we strongly distance ourselves from any form of racism.  If you haven't sent your feedback yet to Customer Relations, please do so via https://t.co/FYE1Wb8emt regards, Chris
@rmwermwc  Hi Rebecca, could you send us your booking code via PM so we can check for you, please? Kind regards, Lyndsay https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

#Servus Marrakech! 🌴🌞 Starting this October, Austrian Airlines resumes direct flights✈ to #Morocco 🇲🇦 2 weekly connections from Vienna to #Marrakech can be booked as of today on https://t.co/TB0fGMn7Sf 
#NewAdventuresAhead #LovingTheWorld #AustrianAirlines https://t.co/OrBgIp6Fgq

urls.title: Book now and discover the most beautiful destinations
urls.description: Even in these times, we bring you safely to your desired destination. Whether on the ground or in the air: we always pay attention to hygiene and your health.

entity.name: People celebrate St. Patrick's Day
entity.description: The following Tweets are part of a live conversation detected by an algorithm.

data.text: Always feeling lucky when flying Austrian Airlines!☘️ #HappyStPatricksDay #LovingTheWorld https://t.co/vcCc8oABGs

@cryptohackz Hi David, we are sorry to hear about your experience and can only apologize for any inconvenience caused. If you haven't sent your feedback yet to Customer Relations, please do so via https://t.co/tLH4nGMTae Kind regards, Chris

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @E_Weissenberger Hallo Eva, es tut mir leid, dass du so lange warten musstest. Wir haben aktuell wieder sehr viele Anrufe. Derzeit benötigen unsere Fluggäste auch mehr Zeit für ihre Anliegen. Bitte teile uns in einer DM mit, wie wir dir helfen können. Liebe Grüße, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s
@rmwermwc Hi Rebecca, thank you for reaching out. Did you also check your spam folder? Kind regards, Derya

@SonnCom Hallo Tom, es tut uns leid, dass deine Anfrage noch immer unbeantwortet blieb. Wir bitten dich um Entschuldigung. Bitte sende uns dein Anliegen/Fallnummer in einer DM. Wir sehen uns deinen Fall gerne näher an. Liebe Grüße, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

@KrauseFx Hallo Felix, während deiner Reise mit Austrian Airlines gilt aufgrund der aktuellen Corona-Verordnung der österreichischen Bundesregierung bis auf weiteres eine Maskenpflicht in Form einer FFP2 Maske. Mehr Informationen dazu findest du hier https://t.co/FTP1iFzvwI. Liebe Grüße,D
@BuiAmelia1 Hi there, please use the following form https://t.co/FU3WnVuGti Kind regards, Chris

data.text: @BuiAmelia1 Hi there, please fill out this online form https://t.co/Af7NsKSvP9 and attach all receipts. Kind regards, Sara

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @elinaklv Hi, please send us as well your booking code in a DM. Kind regards, Christine
@gernblan001 Hi Gern, well since your journey starts in Armenia the local currency applies. Kind regards, Derya
@CraigsWorld_ Hi, please send us your booking code via DM. Kind regards, Christine

@gernblan001 Hi there, we are sorry to hear that you were facing difficulties while booking. Please send us the route and dates you were trying to book. We´ll gladly check it for you. Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s

@gernblan001 Hi there, we are sorry to hear you were facing difficulties with your booking. Please find all information regarding seat reservations via the following link: https://t.co/eFP6hJQmCC Please mind that a seat reservation is not mandatory to complete a booking. Kind regards, Chris

urls.title: Seat reservation
urls.description: Reserve a seat by the window, with extra legroom, more privacy or in your preferred seating zone.

data.text: @Fedbindi Hi Federiga, Please contact our colleagues via the following form regarding a possible refund: https://t.co/qtHWqUZJ9O Due to the high amount of requests we receive at the moment we ask for your understanding that the response can take longer than usual. Kind regards, Chris

urls.title: Enquiry about ticket refunds at customer request
urls.description: You can request refunds for a flight booked on the Austrian Airlines website via our contact form. We’re here to help.

data.text:

#Paralympics2022 #Servus #AustrianAirlines https://t.co/e3LwPhi9LB
@editwit Hi Eduard, we can see that you are already checked in. Enjoy your flight! Kind regards, Christine

data.text: @carrymiddel @lufthansa Hi Carry Van Middel, please contact in this case directly our colleagues via specialcases@austrian.com. Kind regards, Christine

@Editwit Hi Eduard, we had a closer look at your online check-in and could see that your passport details have not been registered. Please contact our check-in staff at Iasi Airport to complete your check-in. Our respective colleagues will further assist you. Kind regards, James
@theGrimey Hi, please send us your booking code as well in a DM. Kind regards, Christine

@george__1992 Hi George, I'm sorry for the inconvenience caused by your missed connection. Please fill out our online form via https://t.co/HwcFYtn859
Please choose "After" to direct your inquiry to the correct department. Kind regards, Sarah

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text:
@JankWangly @yulaeroport Hi Jank, usually all lost or forgotten items on the plane will be collected by the cleaning staff and handed over to the local airport. The items either will placed at the Lost & Found or at the Lost Property Office if there is one. 
Kind regards, Sarah

@jankwangly @yulaeroport Hi Jank, did you fill out the contact form of the Lost Property Office at Montreal Airport? If you haven't please find it via the following contact form https://t.co/G0JY2lOfIg Kind regards, James

urls.title: Where can I claim a lost item at the airport?
urls.description: If you have forgotten an object in a public place at the airport (ex: washrooms, restaurant, parking or general boarding area), please complete our Lost Item Form. Be sure to provide as many detail...

data.text:
@Rachel_C78 Hi, the minimum connecting time for Vienna airport is 25 minutes. In case your first flight will be delayed 
and you'll miss your connecting flight, we will take care of you and rebook you to the next flight available (all flights booked in 1 booking) Kind regards, Sarah

@maskachaskaa Hi, sorry for the inconvenience caused. We are currently facing a high volume of calls in our Customer Service Centers and therefore longer waiting times may occur. You can also try our U.K. number +44 20 76608190 Kind regards, James
@enkelaramadani Hi Enkela, I have just replied to your other message. Kind regards, James
@mjoedoran Hi Joe, sorry for any inconvenience caused. Please tell us your booking code in a DM and we'll try to help. Kind regards, James

@katekerr5 Dear Kate, we're sorry you're not happy with our rebooking policies. If you want us to have a closer look, please send us a DM with your booking reference. Kind regards, Ivana https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s
@mkaser Lieber Martin, ja das Formular online, reicht aus. Liebe Grüße, Ivana
@confuzd_ Lieber Jannik, bitte füll' hierfür das Formular aus: https://t.co/i8Xu5zLAzV. Liebe Grüße, Ivana

@1penxe Hi there, we're sincerely sorry that you've not been able to reach our service center yet. We currently have a lot of calls again. At the moment, our passengers also need more time for their concerns. We're sorry for the inconvenience. Best regards, Christiane
@duberyfirkin Hi there, your tickets have been reissued just today and confirmation has been sent to you. Kind regards, Ivana
@thegrimey Hi there, please send us your booking code in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris

@notablyflippy Hi Chris, usually all lost or forgotten items on the plane will be collected by the cleaning staff and handed over to the airport. Please contact either the Lost Properties Office of Hannover airport or the Lost & Found department of Hannover airport. 
Kind regards, Sarah

data.text: @William__Boyle @manairport @Icelandair @SingaporeAir @emirates Hi William, thank you so much for sharing these nice shots! Best regards, Sarah
@clarkeroddy @edreams Hi Roddy, please send us in a DM your e-mail address, so that we can check if we received your e-mail already. Kind regards, Christine
@rehspeck Hi, es tut mir leid, dass es nicht funktioniert. Melde die Störung bitte hier: https://t.co/tvzpJzJsf4 und unsere KollegInnen schauen sich das gerne an.  Liebe Grüße, Lyndsay
@clarkeroddy @edreams Hi Roddy, please use our online refund form if you still haven't heard from your travel agency. https://t.co/pasAIhUlip Kind regards, Lyndsay

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @poupinette_ Hi Alexandra, we are sorry to hear that you could not take your flight as planned and apologize for any resulting inconvenience. Please feel free to seek reimbursement by submitting a claim here: https://t.co/XX5UMJsyrb - best regards, Brigitte

@sahar_z4 [2/2] as we are dependent on the instructions of the authorities. You can also find more information about international entry restrictions and Covid test requirements via https://t.co/gBexwtJCcx  Kind regards, James

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text: @sahar_z4 [1/2] Hi, passengers who are only changing flights at Vienna Airport (and are not entering Vienna) are generally governed by the relevant entry regulations of their country of origin. We as an airline, do not have special Covid requirements

data.text: @kisasosisa Dear Kisasosisa, I have replied to your previous tweet. Kind regards, Lyndsay

@kisasosisa  Hi Kisasosisa, Austrian Airlines has to comply with Austrian entry requirements and can only accept passengers who have the correct documentation for entry to Austria at the time of check-in. Kind regards, Lyndsay
@olesen_f Hi Sarah, please send us your booking code in a DM. We will be happy to have a closer look. Kind regards, Sara
@olesen_f Hi Sarah, we regret to hear that you have difficulties to reach us. Due to the current situation our lines are very busy. Is there anything we can assist you with? Kind regards, Sara
@maxhartbauer Lieber Max, leider sind all unsere Kanäle überlastet. Sollten wir etwas für dich tun können, dann schick' uns doch bitte eine DM. Liebe Grüße, Ivana

Last year, revenue and passenger numbers improved significantly compared to 2020, yet they accounted for only a third of the pre-crisis level. With the repayment of € 60 mio. of the state-guaranteed loan, we are fulfilling our responsibility towards Austrian taxpayers. 2/2

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text:
2021 was another year marked by the corona pandemic and its impact on the aviation industry. Despite another negative annual result, record bookings pave the runway towards summer. 🛫 1/2

👉 https://t.co/gJl4JSa9ai

Last year, revenue and passenger numbers improved significantly compared to 2020, yet they accounted for only a third of the pre-crisis level. With the repayment of € 60 mio. of the state-guaranteed loan, we are fulfilling our responsibility towards Austrian taxpayers. 2/2
@VR_Travelling Hallo, kannst du uns bitte eine DM mit deinem Buchungscode zukommen lassen? Danke. Liebe Grüße, Ivana
@JSON9000 Hi, sorry for any inconvenience caused. Please DM us your booking code and we'll try to help you. Kind regards, James https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s
@mamlakathe2nd Hi there, please send us your booking code and your required new flight details in a DM so we can take a closer look. Kind regards, Chris
@emilianoucl Hi Emiliano, please be informed that you can also bring a car seat. Kind regards, Chris
@emilianoucl Hi Emiliano, when you're traveling with small kids, you may check in a stroller up to 10kg free of charge. Best regards, Christiane

@rmwermwc Hi Rebecca, please contact our Feedback Management Team by filling out this online form: https://t.co/Af7NsKSvP9 Our colleagues will get back to you.
Kind regards, Sara

urls.title: Help & Contact
urls.description: Do you have any questions about your reservations, your flight or your baggage? Contact us via our contact form. We will be happy to help you.

data.text: @nneuhold Hi Nicolas, es tut uns leid, dass die Bearbeitung deines Anliegens mehr Zeit in Anspruch nimmt. Bitte sende uns die Referenznummer deiner Anfrage in einer DM damit wir uns das genauer ansehen können. Freundliche Grüße, Chris

@rmwermwc Hi Rebecca, we are sorry to hear about your experience so far and apologize for any inconvenience caused. Please contact our service center at the airport one more time regarding your overnight stay. Kind regards, Chris
@fayedast Hi Faye, we apologize for any inconvenience caused. Is there anything we can still assist you with? Kind regards, Chris
We continue to monitor the situation closely and are in close exchange with the authorities.

Due to the current and emerging regulatory situation, Austrian Airlines will not use Russian airspace for the next seven days. Flights to Russia will be suspended during this period. Affected passengers will be informed accordingly.
@Alkholany Hi Mahmoud, I've just replied to your DM. Best regards, Christiane
@alldestroyers Sure, please go ahead. Kind regards, Derya
@alldestroyers Hi Doron, how can we help you? Kind regards, Derya
@roseranguera Hi Roser, we regret to hear that you had no success getting in touch with us by phone. Please send us your inquiry in a DM. Kind regards, Derya https://t.co/3NgZx6Sh8s
@ChrisPannier Hi Christian, wir möchten uns bei dir für die Änderung entschuldigen. Wir wünschen dir dennoch einen schönen Flug! Liebe Grüße, Christine
@okanovic_d Hi Dusan, please mind that the minimum connecting time for Vienna airport is only 25 minutes. Kind regards, Christine
